full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO ZHAL BCU GCIG PA DPAL MO LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA DANG BCAS PA PHAN BDE'I SNANG BA GSAR DNGOM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @029B....@030A *, ,BAR BRTEN RTZOM 'DUN THOG NYE CHAR KHAL KHA NAS DAD STOBS DANG LDAN PA KHE PA'I AAM PA BA'I SE TSE MCHOG SKYABS KYIS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, DPAL MGON 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB DANG, GRUB BRNYES DPAL MOS MDZAD PAS RGYA GZHUNG SOGS PA GZHIGS, GTZO CHER PHYAG NA PADMO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS 'JUG PA BDE BAR BRTEN DANG SO CHE BAR 'DUG PAS DE NYID GZHIR BZUNG, MKHAS GRUB TSAD LDAN GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I CHOG DANG, ,DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES SOGS NAS KHA 'GONGS 'OS KYIS LEGS PAR BRGYAN TE, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'PHAGS PA 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI PHO BRANG PO TA LA'I GZIM CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAR KHAN DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG YON TAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
